name: Amendola - Maturo Maduro - Robusto
additionalNotes: Manufactured at the Aganorsa Factory in Esteli, Nicaragua, Amendola Core Line “Maturo” (Italian translation for maduro) is cloaked in a toothy, dark maduro Corojo 99 wrapper. This medium-full/full bodied chewy flavor bomb is guaranteed to satisfy any cigar smoker with an intriguing smoking experience. Another bold offering from AFC that represents the epitome of rich flavor, aroma, and construction.
